column4: can someone please tell me why i cant switch back to X from a different tty? :/
i have to brute force my computer down from power button :/
are you using the binary-only "nvidia" driver?
would it help if i just disable gettys from /etc/inittab?
but at least i would not be able to accidentally swith to another getty..
ok, well thanks for the info
is it specific to fluxbox (e.g., read only on fluxbox execution)?
yeah, i just set my background there and x keymap and start gnome-settings-daemon
doesn't fluxbox provide functionality to parse such a file on initial execution regardless?
i have been reading the flux manual quite a lot lately. i'll check it again.
